title: Canadaâ€™s Euthanasia Laws Are a Familiar Horror | Guests: Paul Sperry & Blake Masters | 8/23/22
description:
Glenn reviews a speech by Holocaust survivor Vera Sharav warning how fast the Western world can fall into evil practices comparable to Nazi Germany, such as Canada's euthanasia laws. Pat Gray joins Glenn and Stu as they lament the struggles of being surrounded by bad news and the importance of God. Author of "Infiltration" Paul Sperry joins to discuss his Twitter ban for discussing the link he believes exists between the FBI raid on former President Trump and Russiagate. Former investment banker Carol Roth explains why lessening America's energy is an act of self-destruction. Senate candidate Blake Masters joins to share his fight to flip an Arizona seat from Democrat to Republican. Glenn and Stu discuss how the overturning of Roe v. Wade will affect the upcoming midterms.
